body: Some catfolk have stronger and more developed claws than other members of their race, and can use them to make attacks. Catfolk with this racial trait have a pair of claws they can use as natural weapons. These claws are primary attacks that deal 1d4 points of damage. This racial trait replaces natural hunter.
name: Cat's Claws
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Catfolk/Alternate Racial Traits/Cats Claws
